snippet.title: Awesome NEW app Bear Valley from Build-A-Bear Workshop
snippet.description: Check out our NEW app Bear Valley and, for the first time ever, experience Bearville through the animals perspective! Get it now to download and play: http://bit.ly/14BcaD5
